articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys "October Concert"
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys "October Concert"
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il together with senior officials of the party, state and army enjoyed the "October concert" given by the Unhasu Orchestra on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the WPK.
					 Put on the stage were narration and female vocal solo "We Sing of the Party", chorus "Ever-Victorious Workers' Party of Korea", mixed trio and chorus "Our People Are the Master of Revolution", orchestra and chorus "For the Revolution", female vocal solos "Song of Love for People" and "Song of Pyongyang", male trio "Our Nation Is Best", orchestra "All People Are Beaming with Smile", mixed quartet "Do Prosper, the Era of the Workers' Party", narration and music "Song of Comradeship", chorus "We Will Never Forget Our Leader" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 Through the concert the performers sang high praises of the 65 years covered by the WPK winning one victory after another and the era of the great Workers' Party in which the Korean nation's long-cherished ideal and desire are becoming a brilliant reality and successfully reflected the heroic stamina and indomitable will of the army and people of the DPRK who are dashing ahead like the wind to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche and the cause of building a thriving nation under the leadership of the Party.
					
					 Kim Jong Il highly appreciated the success made by the performers and extended thanks to them, expressing great satisfaction over the fact that they presented the best concert rich in ideological contents and high in artistry as it truthfully represented the aspiration and desire of the Korean people.
					
					 Saying that over the past 65 years the WPK has recorded a worthwhile history of great changes and creations in the revolution and construction by leading the popular masses, he noted that the country has an immensely rosy future and the revolutionary cause of the DPRK is always sure to win one victory after another thanks to this guidance of the great Party.
					
					 He expressed expectation and conviction that the artistes would as ever conduct dynamic activities for art creation and thus powerfully encourage the army and people of the DPRK in the struggle to accomplish the cause of building a thriving nation.
					
					 Among the audience were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim and Ri Yong Ho, members of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee, Kim Jong Un, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Kuk Thae, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Kyong Hui, Kang Sok Ju, Pyon Yong Rip, Ri Yong Mu, Ju Sang Song and Hong Sok Hyong, members of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae, Ju Kyu Chang, Ri Thae Nam, Kim Rak Hui, Thae Jong Su, Kim Phyong Hae, U Tong Chuk, Kim Jong Gak and Mun Kyong Dok, alternate members of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee, members of the central leading organ of the WPK and the participants in the Conference of the WPK.

articles.title: Birthday of WPK Marked
articles.content:
Birthday of WPK Marked
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- Celebrations of the 65th birthday of the WPK are going on in the DPRK.
					 A national oratorical contest took place at the People's Palace of Culture Wednesday.
					
					 Present there were officials of ministries and national institutions and officials and other working people in Pyongyang. 
					
					Performers highly praised the immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung who founded the WPK and developed it into the staff of revolution and those of General Secretary Kim Jong Il who built it into the party of the President and a powerful guiding force and laid an eternal foundation for building a rich and powerful country.
					
					 They evinced their resolution to bring about great innovations and leap forward in building a rich and powerful nation true to the leadership of the great party, highly proud of having again Kim Jong Il at the top post of the party and the revolution. 
					
					 A meeting of agricultural workers was held in front of the plaza of the Three-Revolution Exhibition on the same day on the same occasion.

articles.title: Korean Stamp Show Opens
articles.content:
Korean Stamp Show Opens
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- A Korean stamp show was opened with due ceremony at the Korean Stamp Exhibition Hall on Wednesday to celebrate the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					On display are stamps carrying images of President Kim Il Sung, General Secretary Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					
					Also displayed on the thematic order are at least 5,000 kinds of stamps vividly showing the course of victory and glory covered by the WPK under the wise guidance of the peerlessly great persons and introducing the admirable successes made by the army and people of the DPRK in the revolution and construction thanks to the heroic efforts of the Korean people.
					
					 Colorful stamps collected by philatelists across the country are exhibited. 
					
					 Present there at the opening ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Ryu Yong Sop, minister of Post and Telecommunications, officials concerned, philatelists and working people.
					
					 Present there on invitation were officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations of various embassies here.

articles.title: New Postage Stamps Issued
articles.content:
New Postage Stamps Issued
						
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has issued a sheetlet, sheet and individual stamp to mark the 65th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The WPK was founded by President Kim Il Sung on October 10, Juche 34 (1945).
					
					 Since then the Korean people, with a great political guide and true protector of their destiny, have brought about an epoch-making turn in shaping their destiny in an independent way and achieving the prosperity of the country.      
					
					 Seen in the upper and lower parts of the sheetlet are such inscriptions as "Celebration of the 65th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea", "Juche 34 (1945)-Juche 99 (2010)" and "Long live the Workers' Party of Korea, which organizes and guides all victories of the Korean people!"
					
					 Printed in the center of the sheetlet are art works showing immortal feats performed by the President in successfully building the army and the state and turning Korea, once backward, into a socialist power.  
					
					 The sheet contains an art work of the President watching the flag of the WPK while the individual stamp carries a picture of the party's red flag marked with a hammer, sickle and brush.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations Here
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations Here
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- Arriving here on Wednesday to take part in the events for celebrating the 65th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea were Takao Kamakura, director of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, and his party, the delegation of the Mongolian Association for the Study of Juche Idea-Songun headed by its Chairman B. Davaadorj Begz and the delegation of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea headed by its Chairman M. Qamrul Huda.

articles.title: Martyrs' Families and Those Related to Anti-Japanese Struggle Here
articles.content:
Martyrs' Families and Those Related to Anti-Japanese Struggle Here
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- The family of Pak Kil Song, anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, family of Kim Chol, anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr in China, Ri Min and her family and family of Ryang Song Ryong, who are related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle in China, and families of Zhang Shou-jian, Jie Qing, Liu Hanxing, Fan Delin and Chai Shiying, Chinese who are related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, arrived here Wednesday to participate in the celebrations of the 65th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Work Held in Guinea
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Work Held in Guinea 
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- The Juche idea study organizations in Guinea held a joint seminar on General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" on Sept. 29 on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the WPK.
					 On display in the venue were books and photos introducing the immortal feats performed by the peerlessly great persons in the cause of Juche-based party building.
					
					 Speeches were made at the seminar under such titles as "The immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung in the cause of building the WPK" and "Leader Kim Jong Il successfully carrying forward President Kim Il Sung's cause of building the party".
					
					 Riyad Chaloub, chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, noted that the WPK was founded as a working-class party of new type under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung and that it has developed into a tested and experienced revolutionary party tempered in the flames of the struggle of 65 years and an invincible party commanding the absolute support and trust of the people.
					
					 Abdoulaye Conte, chief of the Guinean Group for the Study of Kimjongilism, stressed that the WPK has been further strengthened into a powerful party which formed the integral whole with the leader and the masses of the people as it has had at its top post Kim Jong Il creditably carrying forward the President's cause of building the party.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: WPK Birthday Observed in Various Contries
articles.content:
WPK Birthday Observed in Various Contries
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Denmark, Finland and Bangladesh, a lecture in Mexico, a ceremony of opening Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition in Brazil and a film show in Thailand on Sept. 29 and 30 in celebration of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and its 65th birthday.
					 Displayed in the venues of the functions were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and photos on their immortal feats, books and photos introducing the glorious history of the WPK and Songun Korea and handicrafts associated with the wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 Speeches were made at the events.
					
					 The chairman of the National Leadership of the Communist Party of Denmark said that the factor of invincibility of the WPK lies in the fact that it has regarded the Juche idea as its steadfast guidelines under the guidance of the peerlessly great persons.
					
					 The chairman of the Communists' League of Finland noted that the Conference of the WPK marked a historic event that made it possible to advance the cause of socialism in the DPRK generation after generation and guaranteed its rosy future. And he expressed full support to the Korean people in their efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 The president of the Bangladesh People's League said that it is the happiness and the great auspicious event of not only the Korean people but also the world's progressive mankind to have had Kim Jong Il at the top post of the WPK again. The WPK led by him will always emerge victorious, smashing all sorts of challenges and moves of the imperialists, the president stressed.
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting in Finland.

articles.title: CPC Delegation to Visit DPRK
articles.content:
CPC Delegation to Visit DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Communist Party of China led by Zhou Yongkang, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee and secretary of the Central Commission of Politics and Law of the CPC, will pay an official goodwill visit to the DPRK from October 9 to 11 at an invitation of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Reception Given on Army Day of Egypt
articles.content:
Reception Given on Army Day of Egypt
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- Mohamed Abdelmonem Khalil, military attache of the Egyptian embassy here, gave a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club on Wednesday on the occasion of its army day. 
					 Present there on invitation were general officers and officers of the Korean People's Army, officials concerned, diplomatic envoys and military attaches of embassies of various countries here. 
					
					 Staff members of the Egyptian embassy were present.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: More Rallies Held on Kim Jong Il's Reelection
articles.content:
More Rallies Held on Kim Jong Il's Reelection
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- Rallies took place in Ryanggang Province and Rason City on Tuesday in congratulation of Kim Jong Il's reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Present there were officials of party, power and economic organs and working people's organizations, people from all walks of life and youth and students in the province and city.
					
					 Speakers at the rallies said that having Kim Jong Il at the top post of the WPK is a manifestation of the absolute support and trust of the army and people of the DPRK in him.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, who developed in depth the immortal Juche idea to indicate the way of accomplishing the popular masses' cause of independence, has built the WPK into the party of President Kim Il Sung, setting a shining example in building a revolutionary party in the era of independence, they noted. 
					
					 They underscored the need for the servicepersons and people to firmly arm themselves with the Juche idea and Songun idea, thoroughly embody them in the revolution and construction and staunchly make long journeys for the Songun revolution true to the leadership of the great party.
					
					 The speakers declared that they would more dynamically speed up the advance for effecting a great surge, closely rallied around the Central Committee of the WPK headed by Kim Jong Il, and thus contribute to bringing earlier the victory of the cause of building a thriving nation.
					
					 Meanwhile, more similar rallies are taking place in cities and counties everyday.

articles.title: New Fireworks Developed
articles.content:
New Fireworks Developed
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- More than 100 kinds of new fireworks have been developed in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 They, based on the three elements of the modern fireworks technology -- software, ignition control device and firecrackers -- have reached a high level in color, brightness and formative artistry.
					
					 All the technologies and materials needed for the new fireworks have been developed and made in Korea.
					
					 The fireworks, multi-dimensional in fire cycle, rhythmic display and bursting point and scope in the air, fully represent the feelings of the Korean people.
					
					 Meanwhile, a CNC-based fireworks displaying system has been established and a device developed to definitely guarantee fireworks display in any atmospheric conditions.
					
					 The new fireworks, which have been successfully tested on several occasions, will make their debut in the forthcoming holiday of the Korean people.

articles.title: Murder of Queen Min Termed Japan's State-sponsored Terrorism
articles.content:
Murder of Queen Min Termed Japan's State-sponsored Terrorism
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- The History Society of the DPRK released an indictment Wednesday explaining how the Japanese aggressors planned and carried out the murder of Queen Min. 
					 On October 8, 115 years ago the Japanese reactionary government organized a large group of murderers most of whom belonging to regular armed forces and stormed the royal palace of Korea to kill Queen Min in cold blood, the indictment said, and continued:
					
					 Min, queen of the 26th Emperor of Ri Dynasty Kojong, taking the discord inside the royal palace into account at that time, spoke for the king, administered state affairs and styled herself a de facto ruler and representative of the state power. 
					
					 Her pro-Russian stand scuppered the Japanese aggressors' "domestic policy reform", making it difficult for Japan to step up its policy to dominate and colonize Korea unless a change took place.
					
					 As it became clear that not only its planned domination over Korea but the foundation already laid by it might collapse as long as Min was allowed to live, the Japanese government decided to put its assassination plot on Min into practice.
					
					 In June 1895 the Japanese government discussed the measure for maintaining the foothold of the pro-Japanese forces and singled out Lieut. General Goro Miura as the chief of the assassination operation and appointed him as the Japanese diplomatic minister in Korea after a Cabinet meeting.
					
					 Shortly afterwards, the Japanese government and Miura discussed the plan to assassinate Min and reached an agreement on granting Miura unquestioned right to have all conditions and means provided for putting the plan into practice.
					
					 After working out an assassination plan, Miura made a final decision at a secret meeting room of the Japanese legation and specified an action program on October 3.
					
					 At dawn on October 8, hundreds of Japanese murderers gathered near the Kwanghwa Gate. They hurled training forces into a fierce exchange of fire with royal guards before setting up ladders against the wall of the royal palace and jumping down to fling open the Kwanghwa Gate.
					
					 These man-killers stabbed to death court ladies at random when they were running helter-skelter in screams for shelter as it was not easy to find Min even though they familiarized themselves with her image on a photo.
					
					 However, they could finally confirm that a woman who fell down after being stabbed by a Japanese military police was Min after getting a tip-off from Min's adopted daughter planted by Miura in the palace. They covered Min still alive with a single-layer quilt and carried her to a nearby forest of pine trees in Mt. Rok where they poured petroleum on her body and set her on fire. Not content with this, the murderers threw her scorched remains into a pond.
					
					 This cruel murder of the queen of a country was a serious infringement upon the sovereignty of the country and an unpardonable violation of the dignity of the nation.
					
					 This hideous unethical crime of the Japanese man-killers was perpetrated under the manipulation of the Japanese government from A to Z. The Japanese authorities ran the whole gamut of intrigues to hush up the case and evade the responsibility for it at any cost from the outset even though it was an unpardonable criminal act in view of its motive and objective and the course in which it was perpetrated. But the truth of history can never be written off.
					
					 The Korean people always keep tabs on the human rights abuses committed by Japan and will certainly force Japan to pay dearly for its thrice-cursed crimes.

articles.title: Japan Accused of Its Petty Trick to Dodge Settlement of Its Past Crimes
articles.content:
Japan Accused of Its Petty Trick to Dodge Settlement of Its Past Crimes
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- A Japanese delegate, addressing the recent 15th meeting of the UN Human Rights Council held in Geneva, pulled up the DPRK over the "issue of abduction," asserting that "only some of the victims returned home", "one cannot rule out the possibility that others reported missing in Japan might be abducted to north Korea" and it is necessary to "reinvestigate the abduction."
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 Japan continues making groundless accusations against the DPRK, trumpeting about "the issue of abduction" whenever an opportunity presents itself. This is nothing but a petty trick of the Japanese political heavyweights to prolong their remaining days by using the issue as a bargaining chip and, at the same time, divert elsewhere the attention of the international community demanding Japan redress its past crimes.
					
					 In a word, the behavior of Japan is intended to create the impression that it is interested in the settlement of the "issue of abduction" in a bid to win popularity, recover from its policy failures and, at the same time, paint itself as "a victim" and thus evade the responsibility for its past crimes.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries implored for what they called "cooperation" and "support", peddling "the issue of abduction" in different countries though it had already been settled. The recent row kicked up by them even in the international arena, not content with that solicitation diplomacy, only brings into bolder relief Japan's shamelessness and moral vulgarity.
					
					 Japan owes too much to the Korean people.
					
					 They always keep tabs on the vicious forcible drafting of Koreans, allurement and abduction and mass killings committed by the Japanese imperialists in the past and will force them to pay for those crimes any time.
					
					 Any mean sleight of hand employed by Japan to persistently shun the settlement of its past crimes would only bring it to moral ruin. Japan would be well advised to bear this in mind and honestly fulfill its obligation to redress its past wrongs.

articles.title: Implementation of October 4 Declaration Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Implementation of October 4 Declaration Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification on Monday released a statement which calls for shattering the anti-reunification moves of the U.S. and the sycophantic and treacherous forces and opting for implementing the October 4 declaration on the occasion of the third anniversary of the publication of the declaration.
					 The statement said that the declaration is a programme for achieving the development of the inter-Korean relations, peace and prosperity common to the nation on the basis of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 But the demand of the nation for the implementation of the south-north joint declarations is being ruthlessly quelled by the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors, it noted.
					
					 It demanded the U.S. stop the moves against reunification and quit south Korea at once taking with it its aggression forces.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak regime should stop pursuing moves against reunification and respect the October 4 declaration and halt the confrontation with fellow countrymen and fascist suppression, it demanded.
					
					 The statement called upon all the patriotic people to turn out and wage a more dynamic struggle to implement the inter-Korean joint declarations under the banner of "By Korean nation itself".

articles.title: Actions for Achieving National Reunification Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Actions for Achieving National Reunification Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- South Korean organizations for the national movement including the Tangun Society held an event commemorating the Foundation Day of Korea in Seoul on October 3.
					 Speakers said at the event that the Koreans who have lived with the pride of being a homogeneous nation with a history spanning 5,000 years and brilliant culture since Tangun founded Korea should put a definite end to the division and confrontation and achieve peaceful reunification in the near future.
					
					 The present grave situation in which contradictions and confrontation between the south and the north are running high and the military tension is mounting on the Korean Peninsula as the days go by urgently requires great national unity and cooperation, they noted.
					
					 A declaration released at the event underscored the need for the people of various strata to achieve national reunification without fail and protect the sovereignty and dignity of the nation by the concerted efforts of the Koreans.
					
					 It called upon the people from all walks of life to wage a dynamic struggle to implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and turn out as one in the struggle to resolutely refute and oppose outsiders' domination, interference and war moves against the Korean nation and defend the security of the nation and peace on this land.

articles.title: Korean in Japan Grabs World Pro-Boxing Championship
articles.content:
Korean in Japan Grabs World Pro-Boxing Championship 
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- DPRK Merited Athlete Ri Ryol Ri, a Korean pro-boxer in Japan, won the world pro-boxing title by beating his Thai rival Poonsawat, world pro-boxing title holder, by a decision in a match for the title of the WBA Super Bantam Weight held in Tokyo on October 2.
					 Ri had a hot match with his Thai rival as the latter had a record of 41 victories and a single defeat in his 42 matches. 
					
					 Ri put his rival on the defensive from the start of the match by successive punches, powerful straight punches, upper-cut and stubborn defence, etc., gaining good points in every round.
					
					 Ri thus finished the match 3:0 by a decision.

articles.title: Proposal for Founding DFRK Supported
articles.content:
Proposal for Founding DFRK Supported
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- Antti Sika Aho, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, released a statement on September 30 on the occasion of the 30th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo.
					 The statement said that in October 1980 President Kim Il Sung advanced the proposal calling for reunifying the country by founding a federal republic through the establishment of a unified national government on condition that the north and the south recognize and tolerate each other's ideas and social systems, a government in which the two sides are represented on an equal footing and under which they exercise regional autonomy with equal rights and duties.
					
					 The proposal for reunification advanced by the President is of historic significance and still serves as the most just and realistic proposal for achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea, the statement said, and noted:
					
					The feats performed by the President in the cause of the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea are more brilliantly shining thanks to General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 In order to realize the proposal for founding the DFRK it is necessary, first of all, to put a definite end to the U.S. political and military interference in the Korean Peninsula and force the Lee Myung Bak regime to roll back its anachronistic policy for confrontation with the DPRK at once.
					
					 We are firmly convinced that the Korean people will certainly achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country according to the proposal for founding the DFRK advanced by the President.
					
					 We will as ever positively support and encourage the Korean people in their struggle for independent and peaceful reunification and conduct more widespread activities for solidarity with them.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Bangladesh
Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was brought out in booklet by the Bangladesh Self-Reliance Research Centre.
					 The work, published on Oct. 2, Juche 84 (1995), reviews with high pride the glorious history of the WPK in which it paved a new way for building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, and serves as an immortal great programme for the building of the party and its activities that indicates the road of developing the party into an eternal great party of Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 A book releasing ceremony took place in the building of the Bangladesh People's League on Sept. 30.

articles.title: Story of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Story of Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- One November day in Juche 95 (2006), General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited a newly built rest home of peasants in Hamju County, South Hamgyong Province.
					 Guided to an amusement hall, he saw a yut-game board large enough for some twenty persons to play at the same time.
					
					 He said it would be good for people as many as twenty to play the yut game at the same time and that such folk amusements as yut, Korean chess and kkoni games should be encouraged at the rest home.
					
					 When an official told him that chess and kkoni boards were made outside, he said such boards should also be made inside to play the games in rainy days.  
					
					The officials were deeply touched by his deep care for peasants' pastime during their vacations.

articles.title: Continuan mitines para felicitar a Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Continuan mitines para felicitar a Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 6 de octubre (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 5 los mitines de la provincia de Ryanggang y la ciudad de Rason para festejar la reeleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					  En las ocasiones participaron los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido y el Poder, organos economicos y entidades de masas, los trabajadores de distintos sectores, jovenes y estudiantes en respectivas localidades.
					
					  Los oradores subrayaron que la ratificacion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el cargo cimero del PTC es la muestra de apoyo y confianza absolutos del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea hacia el.
					
					  Al profundizar y desarrollar la inmortal idea Juche, el Dirigente aclaro el camino para realizar la causa de independencia de las masas populares y fortalecio el PTC como el partido del Presidente Kim Il Sung sentando el brillante ejemplo de la construccion de un partido revolucionario de la epoca de independencia, dijeron.
					
					  Destacaron la necesidad de armarse firmemente con la idea Juche, la del Songun, materializarlas cabalmente en la revolucion y la construccion y seguir sin vacilacion alguna el largo camino de la revolucion del Songun bajo la direccion del gran partido.
					
					  Exhortaron a todos a acelerar la marcha en gran auge, unidos firmemente en torno al Comite Central del PTC encabezado por el Dirigente, para contribuir al adelanto de la victoria de la causa de construccion de la gran potencia prospera.
					
					  Por otra parte, tienen lugar en estos dias los mismos actos en las ciudades y distritos.

articles.title: Continuan en varios paises actos por efemerides coreanas
articles.content:
Continuan en varios paises actos por efemerides coreanas 
Pyongyang, 6 de octubre (ATCC) -- Con motivo de la reeleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el 65o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC, tuvieron lugar los dias 29 y 30 de septiembre mitines en Dinamarca, Finlandia y Bangladesh, conferencia en Mexico, acto de apertura de exposicion de libros, fotos, bordados y productos de artes menores en Brasil y encuentro de cine en Tailandia.
					En las ocasiones estaban exhibidos las obras del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y las fotos alusivas a sus imborrables hazanas, los libros y las fotografias que dan a conocer la gloriosa historia del PTC y la Corea del Songun, los bordados y artesanias que reflejan la inteligencia y talentos del pueblo coreano.
					
					Hubo discursos en los actos.
					
					El presidente de la Direccion Nacional del Partido Comunista de Dinamarca senalo que el PTC siempre sale victorioso porque enaltecio a los grandes hombres sin iguales como sus dirigentes y toma por firme guia directriz la idea Juche.
					
					El titular de la Liga de Comunistas de Finlandia recalco que la Conferencia del PTC constituye un acontecimiento historico que posibilita continuar de generacion en generacion la causa socialista de Corea y asegurar su futuro maravilloso.
					
					Y expreso su apoyo total a la lucha del pueblo coreano por construir una gran potencia prospera socialista y reunificar el pais de manera independiente y por via pacifica.
					
					El presidente de la Liga Popular de Bangladesh destaco que la ratificacion de Su Excelencia       Kim Jong Il en el cargo cimero del PTC deviene la felicidad y el gran jubilo no solo del pueblo coreano sino tambien de la humanidad progresista de todo el mundo.
					
					Y puntualizo que el PTC guiado por el siempre saldra victorioso frustrando los desafios y las maniobras de toda indole de los imperialistas.
					
					En el mitin efectuado en Finlandia fue aprobado un mensaje de felicitacion al Dirigente.

articles.title: Inaugurada exposicion de sellos dedicada al 65o aniversario del PTC
articles.content:
Inaugurada exposicion de sellos dedicada al 65o aniversario del PTC
Pyongyang, 6 de octubre (ATCC) -- Quedo inaugurada el dia 6 en la Exhibicion Permanente de Sellos de Corea la Exposicion de Sellos Coreanos dedicada al 65o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					  En la sede del evento fueron exhibidos los sellos que conllevan las imagenes del Presidente           Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk.
					
					  Ademas, fueron expuestos por temas mas de 5 mil sellos que demuestran la trayectoria victoriosa y gloriosa recorrida por el PTC bajo la sabia direccion de esos grandes hombres sin pares y los exitos orgullosos logrados en varias esferas de la revolucion y la construccion gracias a la lucha heroica del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea.
					
					  Tambien se ven varios sellos coleccionados por los filatelistas de todo el pais.
					
					Al acto asistieron el secretario del Comite Central del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, el ministro de Comunicaciones Ryu Yong Sop, y otros funcionarios, filatelistas y trabajadores.
					
					Fueron invitados alli los funcionarios encargados de relaciones de cultura y amistad de las embajadas de varios paises acreditadas en Corea.

articles.title: AHC acusa a los agresores japoneses de asesinato de Minbi
articles.content:
AHC acusa a los agresores japoneses de asesinato de Minbi
						
Pyongyang, 6 de octubre (ATCC) -- La Asociacion de Historiadores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 6 un acta de acusacion para revelar a todo el mundo como los agresores japoneses ejecutaron su plan de asesinar salvajemente a Minbi, esposa del 26o rey de la dinastia de los Ri, Kojong.
					Hace ahora 115 anos, exactamente dicho, el 8 de octubre de 1895, el gobierno reaccionario japones organizo un grupo de matones incorporando a las fuerzas armadas regulares que asaltaria el Palacio Real de Corea para matar a Minbi, comienza el texto y prosigue:
					
					En aquel entonces, aprovechando las cizanas del palacio real, Minbi logro tomar practicamente el poder estatal haciendose la representante del rey. 
					
					La posicion pro-rusa de ella llevaba al fracaso la "reforma interior" de los agresores japoneses y dificultaba la implementacion de la politica de Japon de colonizar a Corea.
					
					Era evidente que mientras este viva Minbi, Japon llegaria a la peor fase en que perderia su terreno ya sentado en Corea lejos de llegar a dominarla.
					
					Por eso, el gobierno japones paso a las acciones para asesinar cautelosamente a Minbi.
					
					En junio de 1895, el gobierno japones discutio las medidas para mantener el terreno de las fuerzas projaponesas. Despues de la reunion del gabinete, nombro al teniente general terrestre Miura como ministro japones acreditado en Corea considerandolo como persona adecuada para ejecutar el plan de asesinato de Minbi. 
					
					Poco despues, el gobierno y Miura discutieron ese plan y acordaron facilitarle al segundo las condiciones para aceptar el complot y darle la autoridad absoluta para movilizar todos los medios necesarios. 
					
					Miura, que elaboro el plan de asesinato, lo confirmo finalmente el 3 de octubre en la sala de reunion secreta de la legacion japonesa y lo detallo para la ejecucion.
					
					  Centenares de matones se reunieron a la madrugada del 8 de octubre en las cercanias de la puerta Kwanghwa.
					
					 Mientras que la unidad de entrenamiento de los japoneses cruzaba los tiros con la unidad de escoltas coreanos que defendia el palacio real, la banda de asesinos brinco la muralla y abrio la puerta Kwanghwa.
					
					  Aunque ya habian visto a Minbi por la foto, los asesinos incursionados a tropel en el palacio real no pudieron encontrarla facilmente porque muchas doncellas de la corte huian por todas partes pidiendo el socorro. Por eso, ellos mataron a sablazo a todas las que salian a su encuentro.
					
					  Con la ayuda de una espia que habia infiltrado como hijastra de Minbi por la indicacion del japones Komura, los gangsteres japoneses confirmaron finalmente que una coreana caida al suelo por el sablazo de un policia militar japones era precisamente la reina.
					
					 Envolvieron con manta acolchada a Minbi no muerta todavia y la llevo al bosque de pinos donde la quemaron con queroseno y tiraron sus restos mortales en una laguna.
					
					  Esto devino intolerable violacion de la soberania del pais y la dignidad nacional.
					
					  Este crimen antietico de los asesinos japoneses fue ejecutado bajo el control del gobierno japones.
					
					  Sin embargo, desde el principio, las autoridades japonesas recurrieron a todas las artimanas para silenciar ese incidente y eludir la responsabilidad.
					
					  Pero, la verdad de la historia no puede ser borrada de ninguna manera.
					
					  El pueblo coreano no olvidara nunca los crimenes antieticos de Japon y saldara la cuenta sin falta de las nunca perdonables barbaridades de los agresores japoneses.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica la actitud cinica de Japon en "tema de secuestro"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica la actitud cinica de Japon en "tema de secuestro"
Pyongyang, 6 de octubre (ATCC) -- En la XV reunion del Consejo de Derechos Humanos de la ONU efectuada recientemente en Ginebra, el delegado japones acuso a Corea en el "problema de secuestro" diciendo que "se repatrio solo una parte de los japoneses secuestrados", "no se puede descartar la posibilidad de que otros desaparecidos en Japon hayan sido llevados al Norte de Corea" y se necesita la "reinvestigacion sobre el problema de secuestro". 
					Esta obstinada acusacion no pasa de ser una artimana de los reaccionarios japoneses para mantener su vida politica polemizando ese tema y distraer la mirada de amplia sociedad internacional que demanda la liquidacion del pasado criminal por parte de Japon.
					
					  Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 6 y continua:
					
					  Japon finge estar "interesado" en el "problema de secuestro" para encubrir los defectos de su politica ganando la simpatia del pueblo y eludir la responsabilidad de sus crimenes del pasado haciendose la "victima".
					
					  Si bien el "problema de secuestro" se ha resuelto ya totalmente, los reaccionarios japoneses lo llevan a otros paises para suplicar la "cooperacion" y el "apoyo" y arman escandalos hasta en los escenarios internacionales. Esto demuestra el cinismo y la bajeza moral de Japon.
					
					  El pueblo coreano no olvida ni por un momento los crimenes del pasado cometidos por los imperialistas japoneses como el arresto forzoso, el rapto, el secuestro y el asesinato de coreanos y cobrara sin falta su precio.
					
					  Si Japon sigue evadiendo la liquidacion del pasado recurriendo a los trucos tan sucios, no podra evitar la destruccion moral.
					
					  El pais isleno debe tenerlo presente y cumplir con sinceridad su deber.
